bibl.title: Rei Publicae causa: Gabinius' Defense of His Restoration of Ptolemy Auletes.
bibl.note: This paper focuses on Gabinius' motivations for the restoration of Ptolemy and his argument that he did so because of the danger to his province posed by an Egypt used as a base for piracy.
bibl.seg: Williams Richard S., Rei Publicae causa: Gabinius' Defense of His Restoration of Ptolemy Auletes.
